output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains two CMF numbers (CMF 11240003, CMF 31240004)
2. Refers to candidate: - Directly mentions and targets Marcel Ciolacu (PSD) - Promotes Cristian Terheș (PNCR) - Uses hashtag #TerhesPresedinte - Tags Cristian Terheș's official accounts
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, it's a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram - Targets a large audience (500,001-1,000,000 people) - Specifically addresses Romanians in diaspora
4. Electoral objective: - Clear electoral intent with #alegeriprezidentiale2024 - Criticizes other candidates (Ciolacu, AUR leadership) - Promotes Terheș through hashtags and mentions - Uses campaign-specific messaging
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This is not journalism as it doesn't present balanced information - Contains political messaging and campaign rhetoric - Uses emotional appeals and campaign slogans
6. Personal opinion: - While expressing opinions, it's clearly campaign material with CMF numbers - Structured as political messaging rather than personal views

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF numbers - Direct promotion of a presidential candidate - Negative messaging against opponents - Paid distribution through social media - Uses campaign hashtags and messaging - Clear electoral intent
conclusion.message-for-police: TOHANEANU NICOLAE-VLADUT PERSOANA FIZICA AUTORIZATA, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propagandă electorală după încheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale, prin intermediul unei postări sponsorizate pe Facebook (ID: 1255773598984272). Materialul promovează candidatul PNCR Cristian Terheș și atacă alți candidați, folosind hashtag-uri electorale și numere CMF (11240003, 31240004), fiind difuzat după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel perioada legală de campanie electorală. Postarea are caracter explicit electoral, vizând influențarea votului prin mesaje de susținere și critică a candidaților.
